REASON: Some mild tiredness for a few hours after taking. Take before bed and its not an issue.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR FENOFIBRATE: I'm surprisingly happy with this med.

REASON: Horrible respiratory distress.  Could not inhale oxygen into my lungs. Pain in shoulders and neck. Finally traced back to only change (by new doctor).  Quit taking immediately. I hate this stuff and wouldn't recommend.  I just keep praying the symptoms will go away soon.
